[Y]Expansion Ecosystem
[W]ROM boards, printers, memory and odd
[W]delights.
[c][m.]
[W]The expansion scene let users build
[W]personal setups from utility-heavy to
[W]game-heavy.
[W]A thoughtful ROM collection turned a
[W]home machine into a compact
[W]productivity station.
[c][m.]
[G]- ROM tools.
[G]- Printer workflows.
[G]- Memory add-ons.
[m][m-]
[Y]SCENE NOTE
[C]Half lab bench, half toy chest.
[c][m.]
